DON'T FLY YOUR BALLOONS!

The United States Air Force will be shooting down all party balloons we find without warning!

The United States Government has detected and tracked multiple high altitude surveillance balloons over the continental United States. Once the balloon were detected, the U.S. government acted by shooting them with anit-aircraft missiles and they went KABOOM! "immediately" (waited for the balloon to cross the entire country) to protect against the collection of sensitive information.


In light of the recent events and in order to protect the security of the United States, from this day forth we will be shooting down every single balloon no matter its size or type. This includes, but is not limited to:

  • China's Spy Baloons
  • Russia's Spy Baloons
  • Maybe even our own Spy Baloons
  • GoodYear™ Advertisement Blimps
  • Party Baloons from Dollar General which could be Spy Balloons
  • So yeah, basically every balloon lol

The U.S Air Force is extremely honored that we are able to protect all American citiens by launching missiles at your party balloons!

NOTE: This will also apply to baloons that are registered outside of the United States.
